title: Person and Vehicle of Interest in ADW (Knife), 1000 b/o Brentwood Rd, NE, on August 19, 2021
author: OfficialDCPolice
comment: The retailers need to protect their staff at all cost...where's security? Theses babies working there are trying to do the right thing.
man dey better give shawty that tackled him a raise or sumn
That $12/hr is not worth risking injury over somebody stealing $100 worth of clothes from a multi-million dollar company. Just wave and watch them leave.
He must have dropped his car keys, so he returned.
I'll keep observant, but can't resist....: He had the knife but wanted the drip for himself.
description:
The Metropolitan Police Department seeks the public's assistance in identifying a person and vehicle of interest in reference to an Assault with a Dangerous Weapon (Knife) incident which occurred in the 1000 block of Brentwood Road, NE, on Thursday, August 19, 2021, at approximately 5:01 PM. The subject and vehicle were captured by nearby cameras.

DO YOUR PART TO HELP PREVENT AND SOLVE CRIME. Crime Solvers of Washington, DC currently offers a reward of up to $1,000 to anyone who provides information that leads to the arrest and indictment of the person or persons responsible for a crime committed in the District of Columbia. Your assistance is appreciated by your community. Ref.: CCN #21-117-276

Anyone who can identify this individual or who has knowledge of this incident should take no action but call police at (202) 727-9099 or text your tip to the Department's TEXT TIP LINE to 50411.

To learn more about the MPD Rewards program, please visit www.mpdc.dc.gov/rewards.
